mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, W. W. J. Bliss to Mrs. E[leanor] P[arke Custis] Lewis, 1850 August 16
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bliss, W. W. J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bliss writes from Baltimore to Eleanor Parke Custis Lewis, Audley, near Berryville, Clark Co., Va. Upon examining Genl. [Zachary] Taylor's papers, came across letter to her without an address--encloses it to her--Mrs. Taylor & Mrs. Bliss overcome by their bereavement [Taylor's death] [Bliss was Taylor's son-in-law]. Autograph letter signed, 1 page, envelope postmarked "Baltimore Md. [ ] 17," stamped with early 5 cent stamp, watermark (J. Whatman).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Taylor, Zachary, 1784-1850
